Design System
Tailwind CSS is active!

Varied solutions.
One balanced experience.

From the digital application to the vehicle – our design system provides the joint set of components, modules and animations for a system-wide user experience.

Our Mission

The user is our benchmark. It is the user’s activities and needs that provide the key focus. User interfaces are as varied as their uses – ranging from inspiring websites to applications for a particular service. The aim is to create varied solutions and a well-balanced, system-wide user experience.

The Basis

Consistency across all touchpoints is achieved through our shared foundations. This showroom demonstrates the tokens, components, and layout structures that form the basis of our design language.

Explore Tokens View Components
